name: painting in a stillness
description: i've made a deeper return to abstraction this year, specifically developing a process of 'digital painting' that maintains an analogue approach by way of software limitation . i have always enjoyed intentionally restricting my process, investigating and experimenting as fully as possible with this reduction . it's an extremely time consuming process, but i find catharsis in 'chasing' a final image that as in this case, finds a space somewhere between the digital, and the organic | 'painting in a stillness' (2021) | Brendan Conrad Forde | @acid_very
